statements: SELECT * FROM team_budget_allocations;
SELECT id, expense_name, expense_amount FROM team_budget_allocations ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT revenue_source, revenue_amount FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE revenue_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE financial_projection = 'positive';
SELECT expense_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM team_budget_allocations GROUP BY expense_name;
SELECT * FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, expense_name, revenue_amount FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE revenue_source = 'Sponsorship' ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT expense_name, revenue_source, financial_projection FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT id, expense_name, expense_amount, revenue_source, revenue_amount, financial_projection FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE financial_projection LIKE '%2022%';
SELECT expense_name, revenue_amount FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE revenue_source <> 'Grants' ORDER BY revenue_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenue_sources ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT revenue_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_sources WHERE revenue_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue_date ASC;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount + revenue_amount AS total FROM expenses JOIN revenue_sources ON expenses.expense_id = revenue_sources.revenue_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT expense_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_name HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM revenue_sources ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, revenue_name, revenue_amount FROM expenses JOIN revenue_sources ON expenses.expense_amount = revenue_sources.revenue_amount AND expenses.expense_date = revenue_sources.revenue_date
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT id, description FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT source_name, amount FROM revenue_sources ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_projections WHERE projected_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, amount, source_type FROM revenue_sources WHERE source_type = 'Sales'
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, amount FROM revenue_sources WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT description FROM expenses WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM financial_projections WHERE revenue_amount > expense_amount
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE budget_amount > 5000
SELECT team_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetAllocations ORDER BY budget_amount DESC
SELECT SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM BudgetAllocations
SELECT team_name, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM BudgetAllocations GROUP BY team_name
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount < 1000
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations;
SELECT team_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE budget_amount > 5000;
SELECT MAX(budget_amount) AS max_budget FROM BudgetAllocations;
SELECT team_name, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM BudgetAllocations GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, revenue_amount FROM RevenueSources ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamBudgetAllocations;
SELECT team_name, budget_allocated, team_lead FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT source_id, revenue_source, amount FROM RevenueSources WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT team_name, budget_allocated, revenue_generated FROM Teams WHERE budget_allocated > revenue_generated;
SELECT * FROM Expenses ORDER BY expense_date ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT team_name, budget_allocated FROM Teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT expense_type, amount FROM Expenses WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY expense_date;
SELECT source_id, amount FROM RevenueSources WHERE revenue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_id, budget, allocation_date FROM TeamBudgetAllocations WHERE budget > 5000 AND team_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY allocation_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, budget_allocated, revenue_generated FROM Teams WHERE revenue_generated > budget_allocated;
